mutants.original_line: b_permutations = {b[i:] + b[:i] for i in range(len(b))}
mutants.mutated_line: b_permutations = {b[i:] - b[:i] for i in range(len(b))}

mutants.original_line: b_permutations = {b[i:] + b[:i] for i in range(len(b))}
mutants.mutated_line: b_permutations = {b[i:] * b[:i] for i in range(len(b))}

mutants.original_line: return any(cycle in a for cycle in b_permutations)
mutants.mutated_line: return any((cycle not in a for cycle in b_permutations))
